programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Mile 22, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: CIA operative Silva and his team race against time, facing military, police, and gangs, to transport an intelligence asset 22 miles to safety in Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths, (2012, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Hundreds of Beavers, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: A drunken applejack salesman must go from zero to hero and become North America's greatest fur trapper by defeating Hundreds of Beavers.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Crime)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Overnight, (2003, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary on the rise and stumble of Troy Duffy, the bartender-cum-filmmaker who was swept up by Miramax's Harvey Weinstein to turn his script for The Boondock Saints into a feature film.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: Grizzly Man, (2005, Documentary)
programme.desc: Werner Herzog (Cave of Forgotten Dreams) crafts a compelling documentary look at wildlife preservationist Timothy Treadwell, who lived unarmed among grizzly bears in Alaska.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Prophecy, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Oscar(r)-winner Christopher Walken stars in this supernatural thriller where the forces of Heaven and Hell fight an epic battle over mankind. Only a priest turned detective and a little girl can stop the dark angel Gabriel (Walken) and save the world.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Relic, (1997, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Come in—if you dare. The opening-night gala for a new exhibit at Chicago's natural history museum is underway. But be advised: something terrifying wants to make sure no one ever leaves.

programme.title: Cube, (1997, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A group of strangers wake up in mysterious room inscribed with an unfamiliar code. Looking for ways to escape, they discover the room is riddled with lethal traps. As fear and distrust swirl around them, the group must work together to survive.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Prophecy, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Oscar(r)-winner Christopher Walken stars in this supernatural thriller where the forces of Heaven and Hell fight an epic battle over mankind. Only a priest turned detective and a little girl can stop the dark angel Gabriel (Walken) and save the world.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Shootist, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: Afflicted with a terminal illness, John Bernard Books, the last of the legendary gunfighters, quietly returns to Carson City for medical attention from his old friend Dr. Hostetler.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The Hunting Party, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: To cattle baron Brandt Ruger (Gene Hackman), his stunning wife (Candice Bergen) is just one of his possessions. So when a notorious bandit kidnaps her, an enraged Ruger organizes a posse to recover his property dead or alive in the searing western!

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merry’s been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the action’s not dead in the water – Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Krieg’s pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things aren’t looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponent’s weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami – who’s on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Nami’s loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing’s for sure – no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Nami’s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami’s treasure, but who’s he working for? More importantly, who’s Nami working for, and what’s she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: The Straw Hats’ faith in Nami is restored, and now it’s time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlong’s fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami – and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Nami’s former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. He’s so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!

programme.title: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffy’s face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town – the final resting place of Gold Roger!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!

programme.title: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the island’s caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!

programme.title: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captain’s place. While they’re busy beating each other’s brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!

programme.title: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!

programme.title: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooter’s goggles, but they lead to a run-in with Daddy the Parent – the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!

programme.title: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanji’s dreams of the legendary All Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji vs. the Beautiful Chef!

programme.title: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Buggy's Revenge! The Man Who Smiles On the Execution Platform!

programme.title: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!

programme.title: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned lifeboat interrupts Luffy and his crew’s voyage to the Grand Line.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!

programme.title: After escaping the clutches of the Marine fleet, the Straw Hats soon find themselves in an equally dangerous predicament – stranded in the Calm Belt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miraculous Creature! Apis's Secret and The Legendary Island!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.
programme.sub-title: Diamon's Shining in the Robot's Eye

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Skinwalkers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: John Wayne: Cold Vengeance, (1935, Drama)
programme.desc: When his father is gunned down by bandits, John Mason (Wayne) hatches a plot to catch the killer. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: John Wayne: Stagecoach Run, (1936, Drama)
programme.desc: A man runs afoul of the villain who attempts to cheat him out of a lucrative mail delivery contract. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senator’s young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Zodiac, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on the Robert Graysmith books about the real life notorious Zodiac, a serial killer who terrorized San Francisco with a string of seemingly random murders during the 1960s and 1970s.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls are taking a tour at one of the high schools they plan to apply to next year.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is stunned at the sight of Usagi and the others enjoying a pie since she actually made the pie for Masanori, the boy she has a crush on.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru and the girls receive an invitation to a party hosted by Edwards, an Englishman who lives alone on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Michiru and Haruka sense that soon they will find the talismans.

programme.desc: Usagi is very intrigued when she hears Chibi-Usa is going to a 'friend’s' house to play.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.desc: Hotaru tries to avoid Chibi-Usa out of fear that her other personality will bring harm. Undaunted, Chibi-Usa invites Hotaru to go on a picnic.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.sub-title: Battle Inside the Demonic Space: The Sailor Guardians' Gamble

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete attacks with Daimon u Choten.
programme.sub-title: The Messiah of Silence Awakens? Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends sneak into Mugen Academy in search of Hotaru, who has gone missing.

programme.desc: A new variety of flower called Tellun is being sold at a flower shop in the Juban District.

programme.sub-title: Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian

programme.desc: Cyprine manages to steal pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa's power and kidnaps her!

programme.sub-title: The Coming Terror of Darkness: Struggle of the Eight Guardians

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Num futuro em que um experimento fracassado matou quase todas as pessoas, um novo sistema de classes emerge.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu país, uma pobre família viaja em busca de melhores condições de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles são atacados por uma gangue de cruéis fora-da-lei, que só poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: Entre Inimigos
programme.desc: No início da II Guerra Mundial, um confronto hostil nos céus da árida floresta norueguesa deixa duas aeronaves – uma britânica e uma alemã – caídas em uma região remota e isolada. Por uma estranha coincidência os grupos procuram abrigo na mesma cabana. Eles têm que lutar para sobreviver ao brutal inverno, para poder voltar à guerra

programme.title: Mergulho Profundo
programme.desc: No início dos anos 80, quando houve o boom de petróleo na Noruega, depósitos enormes foram descobertos no Mar do Norte. As autoridades visavam trazer o óleo para terra através de um gasoduto a 500 metros de profundidade. Eles contratam um mergulhador profissional, que tem a disciplina, força e coragem necessária para assumir essa perigosa missão.

programme.title: Dupla Explosiva: Ecks vs. Sever
programme.desc: O agente do FBI Jonathan Ecks percebe que deve se juntar ao seu inimigo de longa data, o Agente Sever, um agente desonesto da DIA com quem está em combate mortal, a fim de derrotar um inimigo comum que desenvolveu um "microdispositivo" que pode ser injetado em vítimas para matá-las à vontade.

programme.title: O Anel do Rei - A Última Batalha
programme.desc: Baseado em uma lenda do século 13 e estrelado por Edwin Endre (da série Vikings) e James Bloor (Dunkirk), o filme conta uma história repleta de ação épica de um jovem rei que deve aceitar sua responsabilidade e ganhar a confiança do seu povo, a fim de defender a sua liberdade contra as cruzadas violentas.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Plano de Fuga traz Mel Gibson no papel de um criminoso americano que ultrapassa a fronteira entre Estados Unidos e México durante a fuga de um roubo a banco. Ele acaba preso pelas autoridades mexicanas e enviado para um presídio lotado de bandidos de alta periculosidade. Não bastasse essa experiência bizarra, ele acaba se envolvendo com uma família local e se metendo numa grande enrascada em terras estrangeiras porque a bandidagem agora quer a pele dele. Para sobreviver na prisão, ele terá que aceitar a ajuda de um garoto de apenas 9 anos (Kevin Hernandez), com quem irá planejar sua fuga.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing-Fung (Andy Lau) é um policial especialista em desarmar bombas. No meio de uma ação, uma explosão ocorre e ele acaba entrando em coma, além de perder a memória. Ao acordar, Poon recebe a informação de está sendo investigado, acusado de fazer parte do atentado que na verdade, ele estava trabalhando para tentar impedir. Enquanto isso, um verdadeiro terrorista especialista em explosivos, cuja gangue foi derrubada, busca vingança. Ele ameaça explodir um túnel de Hong Kong com centenas de reféns. O policial deverá tentar detê-lo novamente.

programme.title: Entre Inimigos
programme.desc: No início da II Guerra Mundial, um confronto hostil nos céus da árida floresta norueguesa deixa duas aeronaves – uma britânica e uma alemã – caídas em uma região remota e isolada. Por uma estranha coincidência os grupos procuram abrigo na mesma cabana. Eles têm que lutar para sobreviver ao brutal inverno, para poder voltar à guerra

programme.desc: No início dos anos 80, quando houve o boom de petróleo na Noruega, depósitos enormes foram descobertos no Mar do Norte. programme.title: Em Busca da Carta Proibida
programme.desc: Storm Voeten, filho do impressor Klaas Voeten, torna-se alvo de uma caçada da Inquisição. Ajudado por Marieke, uma garota misteriosa que vive nos esgotos subterrâneos da Antuérpia, Storm está em uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar seu pai da morte.

programme.title: O Mistério da Fé
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios após adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Em Busca Do Castelo Dourado
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida - a única coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a África do Sul com sua família para administrar uma fazenda de leões e desenvolve um vínculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leão branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura épica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico
programme.desc: Um lendário caçador de demônios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que forças malignas estão sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: O Mistério da Fé
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios após adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida - a única coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico
programme.desc: Um lendário caçador de demônios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que forças malignas estão sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: Sem Controle
programme.desc: A vida de um jovem vira de cabeça para baixo quando seus sonhos violentos começam a se confundir com a realidade.

programme.title: A Possessão de Mary
programme.desc: David (Gary Oldman) é um capitão de colarinho azul que luta para melhorar a vida de sua família. Estranhamente atraído por um navio abandonado que está em leilão, David impulsivamente compra o barco, acreditando que será o bilhete de sua família para a felicidade e a prosperidade. Mas logo depois que eles embarcam em sua jornada inaugural, eventos estranhos e assustadores começam a aterrorizar David e sua família, fazendo com que se voltem um contra o outro e duvidem de sua própria sanidade.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polícia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura
programme.desc: Enquanto um grupo de adolescentes se prepara para o baile de formatura, eles não sabem que um assassino está em busca de vingança. Uma noite de celebração rapidamente se transforma em um terrível banho de sangue... e todos são suspeitos.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaça muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: C.J. Nichols (Jesse Metcalfe) é um jornalista investigativo disposto a denunciar o famoso promotor Mark Hunter (Michael Douglas), franco candidato a governador, por manipular provas em seus processos. Para isso, decide expor os perigos da evidência circunstancial, que pode levar um inocente a ser condenado, vai preso por um assassinato que não cometeu, mas seu plano começa a dar errado e a sua prisão pode ser definitiva.

programme.title: A Maldição do Castelo Margam
programme.desc: Uma equipe de parapsicólogos americanos viaja ao País de Gales para realizar um estudo no Castelo de Margam, um dos edifícios mais assombrados do Reino Unido.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Após sofrer um grave acidente de carro, April desperta sem lembrar do que aconteceu.

programme.title: Uma História de Amor e Fúria
programme.desc: Gira em torno do amor entre um herói imortal e Janaína, a mulher por quem ele está apaixonado há 600 anos, através da colonização, escravidão, domínio militar e o futuro do Brasil em 2096, em meio às guerras da água.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polícia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura
programme.desc: Enquanto um grupo de adolescentes se prepara para o baile de formatura, eles não sabem que um assassino está em busca de vingança. Uma noite de celebração rapidamente se transforma em um terrível banho de sangue... e todos são suspeitos.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaça muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: Hacker: Todo Crime Tem Um Início
programme.desc: Um jovem imigrante chega ao Canadá e se envolve com uma organização criminosa online chamada Darkweb.

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da máfia começa um trabalho tão grande que os torna alvos tanto da máfia quanto do FBI.

programme.title: A Última Fronteira
programme.desc: Miguel, um médico espanhol, coloca-se em perigo para prestar tratamento médico às vítimas de revoltas militares. Wren é porta-voz de uma organização que financia assistência médica a nações empobrecidas em todo o mundo. Eles se conhecem na Libéria, onde Wren fica imediatamente impressionado com a abnegação, a habilidade médica e o charme de Miguel. Ambos iniciam um romance tórrido, que devem aprender a combinar com seu importante trabalho.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: Hacker: Todo Crime Tem Um Início
programme.desc: Um jovem imigrante chega ao Canadá e se envolve com uma organização criminosa online chamada Darkweb.

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da máfia começa um trabalho tão grande que os torna alvos tanto da máfia quanto do FBI.

programme.title: A Última Fronteira

Wren é porta-voz de uma organização que financia assistência médica a nações empobrecidas em todo o mundo. Eles se conhecem na Libéria, onde Wren fica imediatamente impressionado com a abnegação, a habilidade médica e o charme de Miguel. Ambos iniciam um romance tórrido, que devem aprender a combinar com seu importante trabalho.
